make_hashentry.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ===========================================
00002 !
00003 !           MAKE_HASH
00004 !
00005 !  Make entry in hash-table - returns address 'newentry'
00006 !  Resolve collision if necessary
00007 !   
00008 !
00009 ! ===========================================
00010 
00011 subroutine make_hashentry( keyin, nodein, leavesin, codein, ownerin, newentry, ierror)
00012 
00013   use treevars
00014 
00015   implicit none
00016 
00017   integer*8, intent(in) :: keyin
00018   integer, intent(in) :: nodein, leavesin, codein, ownerin      ! call input parameters
00019   integer, intent(out) :: newentry  ! address in # table returned to calling routine
00020   integer :: ierr
00021   integer :: link_addr, cell_addr, ierror, k, free, addr_count
00022   logical :: resolved
00023 
00024   ierror = 0
00025   addr_count = 1 
00026   free = free_addr(iused)
00027 
00028   ! perform address hashing on key
00029   cell_addr = IAND( keyin, hashconst)
00030 
00031   tablehigh = max(tablehigh,cell_addr)                 ! Track highest address
00032 
00033   if ( htable( cell_addr )%node == 0 .and. htable( cell_addr )%key /=-1 ) then       ! Is entry empty?
00034      newentry = cell_addr                 ! Yes, so create new entry:
00035      htable( cell_addr )%node = nodein          !   local pointer
00036      htable( cell_addr )%key =  keyin            !   key
00037      htable( cell_addr )%leaves = leavesin       !   # contained nodes
00038      htable( cell_addr )%childcode = codein       !  child byte-code or particle #
00039      htable( cell_addr )%owner = ownerin       ! PE owning branch node
00040 
00041      if (point_free(cell_addr) /= 0) then     ! Check if new address in collision res. list
00042         free_addr( point_free(cell_addr) ) = free_addr(sum_unused)  ! Replace free address with last on list
00043         point_free(free_addr(sum_unused)) = point_free(cell_addr)   ! Reset pointer
00044         point_free(cell_addr) = 0
00045         sum_unused = sum_unused - 1
00046      endif
00047 
00048   else if ( htable( cell_addr )%node /= 0 .AND. htable(cell_addr)%key == keyin ) then  
00049      ! Entry exists and keys match
00050      ! => local node  so skip
00051      ierror = 1
00052 
00053 
00054   else            ! Entry exists and keys don't match: COLLISION
00055 
00056      if ( htable( cell_addr )%link == -1) then     ! Entry was occupied without existing link
00057 
00058         newentry =  free  ! Pick next free # address from list of unused table positions (computed at end of treebuild)
00059 
00060         if (htable(free)%node /= 0 ) then
00061            write (*,*) 'Something wrong with address list for collision resolution (free_addr in treebuild)'
00062            write (*,*) 'PE ',me,' key ',keyin,' entry',newentry,' used ',iused,'/',sum_unused
00063           call MPI_ABORT(ierr)
00064         endif
00065         htable( free )%node = nodein                     
00066         htable( free )%key = keyin
00067         htable( free )%childcode = codein
00068         htable( free )%leaves = leavesin
00069         htable( free )%owner = ownerin
00070         htable( free )%link = -1
00071         htable( cell_addr )%link = free     ! Create link from 1st duplicate entry to new entry
00072         iused = iused + 1        ! increment free address counter
00073 
00074 
00075      else if ( htable( cell_addr )%link /= -1 ) then     ! Address occupied with link already
00076 
00077         link_addr = cell_addr                          ! Start of chain
00078         resolved = .false.                                     ! Resolve flag
00079 
00080         do while (  .not. resolved .and. addr_count < maxaddress)       ! Find end of chain  
00081            link_addr = htable(link_addr)%link
00082 
00083            if ( htable( link_addr )%key == keyin ) then
00084               ! Occupied with same key -> local or boundary node, so skip
00085               resolved = .true.
00086               ierror = 1
00087 
00088            else if ( htable(link_addr)%node == 0 .and. htable (link_addr)%link == -1 ) then
00089               ! Found end of chain: entry was occupied by boundary node, so reuse entry
00090               ! link from previous chain entry still valid
00091               newentry = link_addr
00092               htable( link_addr )%node = nodein                     
00093               htable( link_addr )%key = keyin
00094               htable( link_addr )%childcode = codein
00095               htable( link_addr )%leaves = leavesin
00096               htable( link_addr )%owner = ownerin
00097 
00098               if (point_free(link_addr) /= 0) then     ! Check if new address in collision res. list
00099                  free_addr( point_free(link_addr) ) = free_addr(sum_unused)  ! Replace free address with last on list
00100                  point_free(free_addr(sum_unused)) = point_free(link_addr)   ! Reset pointer
00101                  point_free(link_addr) = 0
00102                  sum_unused = sum_unused - 1
00103               endif
00104               resolved = .true.
00105 
00106            else if ( htable(link_addr)%node /= 0 .and. htable (link_addr)%link == -1 ) then
00107               ! Found end of chain: entry occupied with no link
00108               newentry = free          
00109 
00110               if (htable(free)%node /= 0 ) then
00111                  write (*,*) 'Something wrong with address list for collision resolution (free_addr in treebuild)'
00112                  write (*,*) 'PE ',me,' key ',keyin,' entry',newentry,' used ',iused,'/',sum_unused
00113                  call MPI_ABORT(ierr)
00114               endif
00115 
00116               htable( free )%node = nodein                     
00117               htable( free )%key = keyin
00118               htable( free )%childcode = codein
00119               htable( free )%leaves = leavesin
00120               htable( free )%owner = ownerin
00121               htable( free )%link = -1
00122               htable( link_addr )%link = free     ! Create link from 1st duplicate entry to new entry
00123               iused = iused + 1                  ! Increment free_address counter
00124               resolved = .true.
00125            else
00126              addr_count = addr_count + 1
00127               ! not yet resolved - go to next link in chain
00128            endif
00129         end do
00130 
00131         if (addr_count >= maxaddress) then
00132           write (ipefile,'(a5,o20,a)') 'Key ',keyin,' not resolved in MAKE_HASHENTRY'
00133           call MPI_ABORT(ierr)
00134         endif
00135      else
00136         write (ipefile,'(a5,o20,a)') 'Key ',keyin,' not resolved in MAKE_HASHENTRY'
00137         ierror = 2
00138      end if
00139      tablehigh = max(tablehigh,free)                 ! Track highest address
00140 
00141   end if
00142 
00143 
00144 end subroutine make_hashentry
00145
